title: SmartShield Features Overview
content: Explore the core features that make SmartShield a secure and powerful data protection platform.

section.title: Alerts
section.content: Using the power of blockchain, SmartShield detects and generates alerts for unauthorized changes to documents, transactions, database records, audio files, video, or any digital content that needs to be protected from tampering.

section.title: Powerful web-based user interface
section.content: An executive dashboard for management overview, with tools for managing and tracking alerts, reporting, and activity logs.

section.title: Audit Trail
section.content: Fully supported via the ChainSmart online help desk.

section.title: Independent Control
section.content: Data owners can schedule the verification of data directly from SmartShield.

section.title: Customer Support
section.content: Fully supported via the ChainSmart online help desk.
